      • gameIsOver

        public boolean gameIsOver()
        Checks if there are still rounds to play
        Returns:
        True if there is no round left to be played False if the game is not over

      • roundIsOver

        public boolean roundIsOver()
        Checks if there are not cards yet to be played in the current round
        Returns:
        True if all players have already played their card False otherwise

      • playerPlaysCard

        Plays a card of a player
        Parameters:
        playerNum - the id of player that plays the card
        cardPos - the position of the card in the hand of the player

      • newRound

        public void newRound()
        Initializes a new round by defining the current round winner, assigning the played cards to the winning player, distributing new cards if still any, advancing the round number, and updating the starting and the current player
